676: MEGA is Cloud Storage with Powerful Always-On Privacy.
677: MEGA provides robust cloud storage with convenient and powerful always-on privacy. MEGA believes in your right to privacy and provides you with the technology tools to protect it. We call it User Controlled Encryption, or UCE, and it happens automatically.
678: What is MEGA User Controlled Encryption?
679: Files stored on, and transferred to and from MEGA, are encrypted in flight and at rest. While many cloud storage providers claim the same, MEGA is different and adds another layer of security. Unlike the industry norm where cloud storage providers hold the decryption keys, with MEGA, you control the encryption. You hold the keys, and you decide who can access your files, without requiring any risky software installs. All of this is done easily and securely within your web browser.
681: The MEGA Cloud is just the beginning. In the future, MEGA will provide UCE in your browser for a wide range of applications without the need to install anything.

Due to our end-to-end encryption model we have to do so without being able to review the files. Even if we could decrypt them, we could not determine the copyright status without complex analysis and review, which is impractical for the number of files processed each day. We are aware that some agencies submit incorrect takedown notices from time to time, but we are unable to find such errors in advance.
8774: You may file a counter-notice if you believe that access to a file you have uploaded has been wrongly disabled because it was the subject of an incorrect takedown notice. You should only do so if you are confident that no other party owns copyright in the material, or you have rights to store the material and, if you are sharing it, that you have the right to do so.
8775: We can only accept counter-notifications directly from the user whose MEGA account the disabled URL or file refers to. Counter-notifications must be submitted from the email address associated with the MEGA account subject to URL or content take-down.
8776: Upon receipt of a counter-notification, MEGA will promptly provide the person who provided the takedown notification with a copy of the counter-notification, and inform that person that MEGA will replace the removed material or cease disabling access to it in 10 business days. If MEGA does not receive any further communication from or on behalf of the person who originally submitted the takedown notice, or such communication that it does receive does not in MEGA’s sole opinion adequately justify the original takedown notice, MEGA may, but shall not be obliged to, reinstate the material in approximately 10-14 business days provided it has no reason to believe that the material infringes copyright.
8777: Nothing in this policy prejudices MEGA’s right, agreed to by each user in MEGA’s Terms of Service, to remove or disable access to any material at any time, for any reason or no reason.
8778: To file a counter-notification with us, you may click the button below to proceed to our dispute form.
8780: When we receive your counter-notice, we pass it, including your address and other contact information, to the party who issued the original takedown notice. By submitting your counter-notice you authorise us to do so;
8781: Filing a counter-notification may lead to legal proceedings between you and the complaining party;
8782: There may be adverse legal consequences in New Zealand and/or your jurisdiction if you make a false or bad faith allegation by using this process;
8783: If, when using this counter-notice process, you make a false or bad faith allegation or otherwise breach MEGA’s Terms of Service or this policy and that causes MEGA any loss, costs (including legal costs), damages or other liability, MEGA reserves the right to claim for and recover from you that loss, those costs (including full legal costs on a solicitor client basis), damages and other liability, by deduction from any balance in our account and/or by proceedings in New Zealand and/or the jurisdiction of the address in your counter-notice;
8784: This counter-notice process is provided voluntarily by MEGA for the purposes of all applicable copyright takedown and counter-notice regimes in other jurisdictions, but, in doing so, MEGA does not submit itself to any jurisdiction or law other than New Zealand as set out in its Terms of Service. MEGA may amend, suspend or withdraw this counter-notice process at any time, provided that any counter-notices in train at that time shall continue to be processed.
8785: By filing a counter-notice, you are deemed to have accepted the above terms. If you do not accept the above terms, do not file a counter-notice.
8786: If there is any inconsistency or ambiguity between the English and other language versions of the above terms, the English version shall prevail.

Edward Snowden’s revelations 137 days later fundamentally changed public attitudes and it became excruciatingly clear that [I]security by policy[/I] (“we have access to your data, but we promise to keep it confidential and not misuse it”) had not been good enough. Anything short of [I]security by design[/I] (“we cannot gain access to your data without you being able to find out”), for which strong end-to-end encryption is an essential prerequisite, now seems grossly insufficient.

20018: MEGA does not encrypt the client device of the user. MEGA recommends the use of a strong screen passphrase and device-level full-disk encryption, which is now enabled by default on new Android and iOS devices.
20020: MEGA’s end-to-end encryption (E2EE) paradigm enhances the overall security by providing privacy by design, unlike many of its competitors who only provide privacy by policy, but it is not a silver bullet solution to all potential security threats. It is critical that the endpoint devices are secure as any breach on an endpoint device can break the E2EE chain.
20022: For example, a backdoor or virus on the user’s endpoint device’s operating system could allow a rogue attacker to intercept unencrypted data, log keystrokes or directly capture audio/video from the device’s microphone/camera.[Br]It is therefore important that the user does not solely rely on MEGA, but also ensures that their endpoint devices (on which the user runs the MEGA client software) are secure.
20024: To enable independent verification of our cryptographic model and service reliability, we publish MEGA’s design and security processes in a whitepaper.
20026: We also allow independent verification of the correctness and integrity of the actual implementation by publishing the full source code of our client apps.

23072: MEGA was launched on January 20, 2013 - exactly one year after the infamous destruction of Megaupload by the US Government. It was founded by the same people who had created Megaupload, including Kim Dotcom, Mathias Ortmann and Bram van der Kolk.
23073: Dotcom, while not involved in MEGA’s design or technical implementation, excelled at marketing and fundraising. Within a year, he had sold most of his shareholding and stepped down as a Director to pursue new goals.
23074: Many people see MEGA as the natural reincarnation of Megaupload, but the reality is a lot more nuanced. While the expertise from running a large scale cloud storage service like Megaupload assisted in the architectural design, MEGA’s product is fundamentally more sophisticated in every conceivable way.
23075: Furthermore, owing to its controversial background, MEGA has invested heavily in compliance under the guidance of its global legal advisers. MEGA enforces its [A1]Terms of Service[/A1] strictly and provides a [A2]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A2]. MEGA also periodically publishes a [A3]transparency report[/A3].

23118: What is MEGA user controlled encryption?
23120: On 25 May 2018, the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) came into effect. The GDPR provides rights to European users, but, as a leading privacy company, we make the GDPR protections and rights available to all our users globally in respect of personal data (or “personal information” as we refer to it in New Zealand), wherever they may live.
23121: Mega’s Terms of Service, Privacy and Data Policy, Takedown Guidance Policy and Contacts provide all the disclosures and explanations required by the GDPR.
23122: MEGA’s mission is not limited to just keeping your valuable data private: safeguarding it is equally important to us.
23123: Technical issues are a fact of life. Hard disks fail on a daily basis. Sometimes, an entire server goes down. And despite the best efforts of our datacentre operators and fibre carriers, power outages and fibre cuts happen more often than not.
23124: We do not want you to have to worry about such mishaps. We want you to be able to access your files 24/7, even while an entire country we host in has gone offline (which we hope won’t ever happen).
23126: The solution is simple: we split each file into roughly equal-sized parts and store each of them in a different country. We also store another part (in yet another country) recording whether the number of “1” bits at a certain position within all parts is even or odd.[BR]This means that you can reconstruct your data even when one of the parts is unavailable. And best of all, your browser can connect directly to all datacentres and reassemble your file thanks to our unique JavaScript on-the-fly transfer processing engine that we also use for our end-to-end cryptography.
23129: MEGA operates CloudRAID datacentres in Luxembourg, Germany, France, Netherlands, Spain, Belgium and Canada and has a total carrier uplink capacity of more than 1000 gigabit/s.

about_contributors: MEGA has [S]remote contributors in more than 20 countries[/S] around the globe.
about_flexibility: Our offices operate in hybrid mode with high flexibility, including multiple work-from-home days per week.
about_job_expressions_txt: Looking for something else?[BR]Send us your details and let’s talk.
about_leadership_desc: MEGA benefits from strong decisive leaders who are dedicated to the company’s core values.
about_mega_story_desc_1: After three months of coding by Mathias Ortmann and Bram van der Kolk, MEGA is released with immediate global publicity. One million users register in the first three days.
about_mega_story_desc_10: We release our high-performance enterprise storage solution, MEGA for Business, with multiuser support and large-capacity storage options.
about_mega_story_desc_11: October 2020 sees MEGA hit the 200 million registered users milestone.
about_mega_story_desc_12: MEGA continues to grow rapidly and now employs almost 150 staff worldwide.
about_mega_story_desc_2: MEGA provides an easy to use end-to-end encrypted service across mobile and desktop platforms. Our Android app demonstrates an important part of our mission, to provide security and privacy to users on all platforms and in multiple languages.
about_mega_story_desc_3: Our mobile app for Apple iOS provides easy access to security and privacy for many more users.
about_mega_story_desc_4: Windows, macOS and Linux users now have an easy to use native application to automatically synchronize their computer data with the MEGA Cloud.
about_mega_story_desc_5: In just over 12 months, MEGA users have stored more than one billion files in their secure accounts.
about_mega_story_desc_6: MEGA expands its product offerings with MEGAchat, our secure, end-to-end encrypted communications platform with easy file sharing built in.
about_mega_story_desc_7: MEGAchat provides secure communications with end-to-end encryption for web browsers and mobile apps (Android and iOS)
about_mega_story_desc_8: MEGA releases a powerful scriptable interactive command shell for advanced users and sysadmins.
about_mega_story_desc_9: Rapid business growth sees MEGA reach 100 million registered users, who together have uploaded more than 40 billion files.
about_mega_story_subtitle_7: MEGAchat: secure text, voice and video chat
about_our_mission_empower_desc: Everyone has the right to privacy, which is why we make sure MEGA is easy to use even for non-technical users. Our technology is for everybody and runs on the tools you use: mobile devices, web browsers and the command line for advanced users, all with the strongest emphasis on privacy. As a MEGA customer, you and your data are never the products.
about_our_mission_leader_desc: MEGA was the first to introduce fully featured, end-to-end encrypted cloud storage and communications, accessed through web browsers and mobile devices. We constantly improve our products, centred on Privacy by Design.
about_our_mission_privacy_desc: Data should never leave an individual’s device unless it has been encrypted in such a way that it can only be processed by the user, or intended recipients.
about_vision_desc: To be the leading global cloud storage and collaboration platform, providing the highest levels of data privacy and security.

bsn_collaborate_info: Exchange messages, share files and have audio and video calls with your team, all protected by MEGA’s end-to-end encryption.
bsn_compare_info1: MEGA for Business does things differently. We charge separately for users, storage and transfer quota. Even better, we only charge for your actual usage in 1 TB increments. No need to pay upfront for large storage or transfer quotas, in case you might need it later. With MEGA for Business you only pay for what you need.
bsn_compare_info2: Try MEGA’s cost comparison tool to see how much you can save.
bsn_feedback_quote1: “With its strong dedication to privacy and security, it is one of the safest cloud services around.”
bsn_feedback_quote2: “MEGA provides an excellent balance between workflow, productivity and privacy.”
bsn_feedback_quote3: “Fast, easy to use and good value if you need to store masses and masses of data in the cloud.”
bsn_feedback_quote4: “MEGA manages to cater for both absolute beginners to cloud storage, as well as more advanced users who might need encrypted chat or a command line interface.”
bsn_feedback_quote5: “In our testing, upload and download speeds were excellent.”

carousel_quotation_1: “With an insanely generous free tier and a simple drag-and-drop interface, New Zealand based MEGA is one of the cloud storage heavyweights. There’s a handy mobile app to allow you to upload files and photos, as well as sync clients with desktop machines.”
carousel_quotation_10: “MEGA provides one of the best services I know. The quality of your product exceeds my expectations.”
carousel_quotation_11: “First of all, thank you for creating MEGA and all the work you’ve put into it. It’s my favourite cloud storage and file hosting service.”
carousel_quotation_12: “MEGA is great! I like the services you provide as a whole and appreciate the dark mode update. 💟”
carousel_quotation_13: “MEGA has no equal and has ALWAYS worked flawlessly for me! It has always worked without a hitch even in the middle of a hurricane - thank you for providing such an excellent system!”
carousel_quotation_14: “MEGA is amazing! I’ve been with MEGA for over 8 years and am ever appreciative for all your hard work!”
carousel_quotation_15: “It is awesome that I can view/read/play files on my mobile device directly. I depend on you daily and you have never let me down! Keep up the great work MEGA!”
carousel_quotation_2: “Mega Limited offers four different cloud storage plans that vary based on your storage needs. Features include a live encrypted backup, end-to-end encryption and secure global access.”
carousel_quotation_3: “MEGA doesn’t take your privacy for granted, so it makes sure nobody but you can read your data. The main resources it uses for that are zero-knowledge encryption and a strong privacy policy that extends the GDPR rules to all MEGA users.”
carousel_quotation_4: “MEGA delivers several strong aspects for any cloud service. MEGA’s main system is flexible in terms of compatibility with various platforms, and it is very user-friendly. The emphasis on security is also an immensely important addition.”

jobs_culture_card_desc: At MEGA, we care about results. You will have a lot of freedom and flexibility to plan your work around your life. We are proud of our culturally diverse and inclusive global community.
jobs_culture_invert_card_desc: Here at MEGA, our global team work hard to ensure we create an environment everyone can flourish in. We know how to celebrate success and enjoy ourselves! We thrive on an inclusive, supportive and honest culture for all. We also value play as much as work - a bit of fun never hurt anyone!
jobs_grow_card_desc: Develop your career and learn valuable skills with MEGA.
jobs_grow_invert_card_desc: We actively coach and develop our team. Join MEGA and we’ll ensure we keep your career moving. We’ll provide in-house and professional development, no matter your role or career aspirations.[BR]MEGA is growing fast and so is our team so climb aboard!
jobs_life_card_desc: Enjoy a great work and life balance in beautiful New Zealand, Spain or in a 100% remote role.
jobs_life_invert_card_desc: MEGA offers flexible working hours, and locations. Our office regulars can work from home two days a week, which is a very popular option. Remote MEGA workers may be offered paid travel to our offices in Auckland, or Salamanca in Spain.
jobs_opportunity_card_desc: Be a part of a world-class team, working with the world’s leading experts in applied cryptography.
jobs_opportunity_invert_card_desc: - Work with expert developers on a code base that will challenge you and from which you will learn a lot.[BR]- Work on products that you can use yourself in your daily life.[BR]- Learn secure development best practices.
jobs_subtitle_1: MEGA is a fully hybrid workplace, including 100% remote positions around the globe.
jobs_support_card_desc: We provide you with the best possible tools to be productive, both in terms of hardware and software.
jobs_support_invert_card_desc: You will be supported with the best possible equipment for your work, across multiple technology platforms.
jobs_vision_card_desc: Your contribution will have real impact on a vast user base. Make a difference for Internet privacy on a global scale.
jobs_vision_invert_card_desc: After being the first to introduce fully featured end-to-end encrypted cloud storage accessible through web browsers, we continue to blaze a trail centred on Privacy by Design.

mtags_desc_about: MEGA launched in 2013 as the world’s first zero-knowledge, easy to use cloud storage provider with user-controlled end-to-end encryption.
mtags_desc_about_jobs: Join the world’s largest fully-featured cloud storage and privacy company. Check out our latest job listings and apply today.
mtags_desc_about_priv: MEGA is the world’s leading fully-featured end-to-end encrypted cloud storage provider. We strive to offer the highest levels of privacy possible.
mtags_desc_about_rel: MEGA’s CloudRAID technology means files are split into equal-sized parts and stored in different countries for additional service robustness.
mtags_desc_business: Massive storage, secure sharing across devices and 24/7 support make MEGA for Business the obvious choice for your team.
mtags_desc_cmd: System administrators can automate MEGA account access by integrating scripts with the MEGA CMD tool.
mtags_desc_extensions: Install the MEGA extension for your browser to reduce load times, improve performance and strengthen security.
mtags_desc_login: Log into your MEGA account. Access the world’s most trusted, protected cloud storage.
mtags_desc_mobile: Download the MEGA app to securely upload, access and stream your files across your devices, or communicate with our end-to-end encrypted chat.
mtags_desc_nas: Access your MEGA account directly on your QNAP and Synology Network Attached Storage (NAS) with our MEGA CMD tool.
mtags_desc_refer: Refer your contacts to MEGA and earn 20 percent commission for each paid plan sign up.
mtags_desc_registerb: With our user-controlled end-to-end encryption, your data and communications have never been safer. MEGA is the secure solution for your business.
mtags_desc_security: Your files and chats are end-to-end encrypted with keys controlled by you and nobody else.
mtags_desc_security_bugbounty: Earn Bounties For Finding Bugs And Other Issues At MEGA
mtags_desc_srccode: We publish the full source code for our client apps and welcome independent verification and integrity checks.
mtags_desc_start: MEGA understands the importance of keeping data and conversations private. We provide a fantastic user experience that protects users’ right to privacy.
mtags_desc_sync: Our MEGA Desktop App allows you to easily automate synchronisation between your computer and your MEGA Cloud Storage. Available for macOS, Windows, and Linux.
mtags_title_security_bugbounty: We Welcome Security And Bug Reports - MEGA
mtags_title_start: The Most Trusted, Best-Protected Cloud Storage - MEGA

promotion_page_description_data_is_secur: MEGA protects your data from online attacks with zero-knowledge encryption. Simply put - your data is encrypted and only you hold the keys.
promotion_page_description_easily_access: Easily access your files through our desktop app, mobile apps or the web, anywhere and anytime.

ri_s4_betat_subheader: Please fill in the form and we will be in touch about the MEGA S4 Object Storage beta program.
ri_s4_card1_desc: MEGA will provide S3 with [B]E2EE[/B] and security by design. With our emphasis on security your data will always be safe.
ri_s4_card2_desc: We are leveraging our existing infrastructure spread across 9 global datacentres, storing more than an Exabyte (1,073,741,824 Gigabytes) for over 235 million users today.
ri_s4_card3_desc: We have technology in place to [B]protect your data[/B] from loss or corruption for 99.999999999% (11 9’s) annual durability.
ri_s4_card4_desc: At %1* per TB per month, MEGA will be [B]7 times cheaper[/B] than Amazon S3, with infinite scalability and no tiering for hot or cold data.
ri_s4_card4_header: Storage that won’t break your budget
ri_s4_card5_desc: Our service is [B]fully compatible[/B] with S3 while fully integrated with MEGA’s existing product suite.
ri_s4_card6_desc: From the entertainment industry to governments. From law enforcement to startups, and corporates of all kinds. MEGA S4 will interface with a huge eco system of apps, services and SDKs.
ri_s4_image_desc: Image above: MEGA S4 Object Storage version 1.1

troy_experienced_desc: In 2013 MEGA launched the world’s first user-controlled end-to-end encrypted cloud storage service, with browser support.
troy_generous_storage_desc: Looking for a cloud storage provider that offers generous storage space and works from any device, which makes it easy to access your files and share or communicate from wherever you are? Give MEGA Pro a try now.
troy_generous_storage_desc2: Try MEGA’s Pro plan features for a month and see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your trial now, with no credit card required.
troy_generous_storage_desc3: Looking for a cloud storage provider that offers generous storage space and works from any device, which makes it easy to collaborate with your team, and share data or communicate with them from wherever you are? Give MEGA for Business a try now.
troy_generous_storage_desc4: {nbMonths, plural, one {Try MEGA for Business for an entire month, free of charge, to see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your MEGA for Business trial now with an account for 3 users and 15 TB of storage.} other {Try MEGA for Business for # months, free of charge, to see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your MEGA for Business trial now with an account for 3 users and 15 TB of storage.}}
troy_home_banner: MEGA provides fully-featured cloud storage and communications, with user-controlled end-to-end encryption.
troy_how_desc: MEGA strives to serve customers who value data safety, security and privacy. With that ethos in mind, we constantly improve and enhance our products.
troy_note_footer: Both offerings provide MEGA’s no-compromise, user-controlled end-to-end encrypted cloud storage, transfers, and communications.
troy_note_switch: You can change your selection on the next page if required.
troy_privacy_desc: We believe that data privacy, including zero-knowledge encryption, is a fundamental human right. This is why MEGA is built with “Privacy by Design”.
troy_pro_free: {nbMonths, plural, one {MEGA Pro free for one month.} other {MEGA Pro free for # months.}}
troy_pro_try: {nbMonths, plural, one {Try MEGA Pro. It’s free for a month. No credit card required.} other {Try MEGA Pro. It’s free for # months. No credit card required.}}
troy_secure_comm_desc: Communicate securely and privately, exchange messages, share files with MEGA’s end-to-end encrypted chat which also supports audio and video calls. Have face to face meetings anytime knowing it’s totally private.
troy_secure_comm_desc2: Available across multiple platforms including mobile devices, MEGAchat connects securely for group chat with contacts everywhere in the world, near and far.
troy_success: Success. We have sent you an email to get you started with your free storage.
troy_team_3: With a team of three or more
troy_trusted_desc: Our mission is to bring the highest levels of data privacy and security to the Internet. MEGA’s pioneering technology has earned the trust of over 230 million users.
troy_why_desc: To bring genuine privacy and security to the 84% of Internet users who care about their privacy and their data, and want more control over how their data is being used*.
troy_why_store: Why you should store your important data with MEGA
troy_working_desc: We are building a world in which technology empowers and enables, where you and your data are not the products for sale.
troy_zero_knowledge_desc: With user controlled end-to-end encryption you can be confident MEGA is a private place to store your important data. MEGA does not have access to your password or your data. Using a strong and unique password will ensure that your data is protected from being hacked and gives you total confidence that your information will remain just that: yours. Our support team is available around the clock, every day of the week, with priority support for Pro users.
troy_zero_knowledge_desc2: With user controlled end-to-end encryption you can be confident MEGA is a very strong link in your security chain. Securely share files and collaborate with your team. Be more productive with business-specific features, including user management and password protected links. Our support team is available every day of the week, around the clock, with priority support for MEGA for Business customers.
